rankDescription.youngling_description: Just getting started with this skill or technology. While not yet proficient, I'm actively learning and improving.
rankDescription.padawan_description: Have a good understanding of this skill or technology. I've used it in some projects and I'm comfortable with the basics.
rankDescription.knight_description: Comfortable using this skill or technology in a professional context. I have used it in various projects and can work independently with it.
rankDescription.master_description: Very comfortable and experienced with this skill or technology. I can mentor others and help them to learn this skill.
rankDescription.council_member_description: Deeply experienced with this skill or technology. I can make high-level decisions, create advanced projects and provide strong leadership.
rankDescription.master_of_the_order_description: Exceptionally knowledgeable in this skill or technology. I'm a thought leader, setting strategy and ensuring others are following best practices.
rankDescription.grand_master_description: Among the top experts in this skill or technology. My expertise is recognized by peers, and I'm called upon to solve the most challenging problems.
